backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing admins and officers with CRUD operations, sorted queries, and message payload generation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI files, components, and test IDs for SMS removal, tel: removal, and WhatsApp‑focused messaging updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing all major frontend pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/ARDUINO_DEVICE_INTEGRATION.md: Guide explaining Arduino’s sensor collection, Firebase telemetry upload, and GSM‑based SMS alerting.
frontend/FIREBASE_RTDB_FIELDS.md: Reference for Firebase RTDB structure, required sensor fields, aliases, and device write expectations.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app, PWA metadata, manifest, and icons.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, colors, icons, and display configuration.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing basic installability, cache cleanup, and network‑first fetch handling.
frontend/PWA_AND_LOCAL_RUN.md: Instructions for installing the app as a PWA on Windows and running the project locally with required tools.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application configuring routes, authentication guards, theming, and layout selection.
frontend/src/components/admin/FirebaseTe: UI action card that initializes Firebase telemetry fields, showing success or error alerts with a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/charts/LineTrend: Renders a temperature and humidity line chart or an empty-state message using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/charts/StatusPie: Displays alert status distribution as a pie chart with dynamic values based on alert levels.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Alerts: Shows critical, warning, or normal alert messages based on prediction and prevention alert levels.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Summar: Generates metric summary cards for various telemetry readings, supporting demo values.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, navigation, footer, and routing outlet, plus logout handling.
frontend/src/components/messaging/Office: Builds alert messages for officers, enabling copy, WhatsApp chat, and call actions based on telemetry and alert status.
frontend/src/components/officers/Officer: Dialog form component for adding or editing officers with input validation and Firebase-backed submission.
Displays a table of officers with actions for editing, deleting, copying numbers, and opening WhatsApp chats.
frontend/src/components/reports/ReportsC: Renders a responsive bar chart showing warnings and critical alerts over time.
frontend/src/components/reports/ReportsT: Shows a summary table of aggregated report data with totals by period.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout methods, and initializes AuthClient with stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfficers.ts: Convenience hooks for fetching, adding/updating, and deleting officers using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements react-query hooks for retrieving, upserting, and deleting officers from Firebase RTDB.
frontend/src/hooks/useTelemetry.ts: Subscribes to Firebase telemetry data, parses real-time and historical readings, and updates a global store.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining theme variables, dark mode overrides, and animation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/alertStatus.ts: Computes alert levels based on telemetry, distinguishing prediction and active fire conditions.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Provides an async helper to copy text to the clipboard with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/demoTelemetry.ts: Returns demo telemetry values and generates synthetic hourly time‑series data.
frontend/src/lib/firebase.ts: Mock Firebase RTDB client implementing refs, value listeners, and REST‑based polling.
frontend/src/lib/geo.ts: Validates latitude/longitude and formats coordinates to fixed precision.
frontend/src/lib/officersRtdb.ts: Implements CRUD operations for officers in Firebase RTDB using REST calls.
frontend/src/lib/reporting.ts: Aggregates time‑series telemetry into monthly or yearly warning and alert summaries.
frontend/src/lib/sms.ts: Builds SMS deep links, attempts to open the SMS app, and provides default message helpers.
frontend/src/lib/telemetryBootstrap.ts: Initializes telemetry fields at the Firebase RTDB root via PATCH without overwriting other nodes.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Builds WhatsApp deep links, sanitizes phone numbers, and opens chats in a new window.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page showing telemetry status, alerts, charts, demo mode, and admin bootstrap when data is missing.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login form with captcha and hardcoded admin credentials, navigating to the dashboard on success.
frontend/src/pages/Map.tsx: Displays GPS coordinates and an embedded map, with copy-to-clipboard and fallback behavior for invalid coordinates.
frontend/src/pages/Officers.tsx: Officer directory page supporting search, listing, and adding officers via a dialog.
frontend/src/pages/Reports.tsx: Reports page showing monthly and yearly aggregated telemetry trends with optional demo mode.
frontend/src/pages/Splash.tsx: Splash screen with branding and a start button redirecting to login.
frontend/src/state/authSession.ts: Simple auth session manager storing login state in localStorage.
frontend/src/state/telemetryStore.ts: Zustand store for holding and updating the current telemetry object.
frontend/src/types/telemetry.ts: Telemetry type definitions for sensor readings and time-series entries.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the real-time forest-fire monitoring web app, its Firebase-based architecture, requirements, and known issues.
